description: Trade names filed with the Secretary of State. This dataset includes the business name and address for filing organizations. A trade name, trading name, or business name, is a name that a business uses for trading commercial products or services. A business may also use its registered, legal name for contracts and other formal purposes.

metadata.attribution: SOS - Secretary of State - business division
